name: Words I want to say to you piles up
name_original: Words I want to say to you piles up
description:
|| Description ||

This is a non-commercial project, made for SAE GAME JAM 2021. 

Sana, a young japanese girl fell in love with her best friend, Yuu. She has been overthinking of many scenarios  how to confess her love. 

Plays in Sana's perspective, feels her nervous and excitement during this Doki doki moment. 

*Dev note: There are more than 8 slightly different endings *

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
